post:
Hi fellow HostBallers,

It’s been 15 years since I started QuickPacket! Seems like just yesterday I was building AMD Athlon XP 2800+ tower whiteboxes to colo on a bread rack. Elite 399 Passmark score!

Anyway, over the years servers have definitely gotten better, and I have a few good ones on special to honor our 15th anniversary.

Dual L5520, 24GB RAM, 2x 2TB HD or 2x 128GB SSD, 20TB transfer on 1G Port, IPMI, /29 IPv4, /64 IPv6, Charlotte, NC (US East Coast), $30/month - link to order

E3-1230v3, 16GB RAM, 1TB HD or 128GB SSD, 20TB on 1Gbps Port, /29 IPv4, /64 IPv6, IPMI - Charlotte, NC (US East Coast) - $35/month - link to order

Dual L5640, 24GB RAM, 2x 2TB HD or 2x 128GB SSD, 20TB transfer on 1G Port, IPMI, /29 IPv4, /64 IPv6, Charlotte, NC (US East Coast), $45/month - link to order

E5-2620, 16GB RAM, 1TB HD or 128GB SSD, 20TB on 1Gbps Port, /29 IPv4, /64 IPv6, IPMI - Charlotte, NC (US East Coast) - $50/month - click to order

Thanks for the business and we look forward to the future.
